summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 1999 Local Law Enforcement Block Grant Program; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the U.S. Department of Justice, Bureau of Justice Assistance for financial assistance in the amount of One Million Two Hundred Fifty Eight Thousand Seventy Two Dollars ($1,258,072) to enhance public safety through a variety of initiatives; accepting the money when received; increasing the 1999 budgets of various departments by making reimbursable appropriations; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
